naththal siyage aarambhaya thamayi santha nikalas thuma.ethuma lassana adumak adagena sitha ratawala rathri kalaye di duppath lamayinge gewal lagata gos owunta thagi thiya hangila enawa.eya thamayi naththal siyage aarambhaya.sent nikalas yana namaya bidi santa klos yana namaya sadi atha.warthamanaya wana wita naththal siya wanija weleda bhandayak bawata pathwa thibe.

web perahana:mema thiraya osse obe daruwa wenuwen sidukaranu labana palanayan obe kamaththa paridi sidu karanna.mehi “nishchitha web adawi walata ida denna saha awuranna” yana kotasa yatathe athi “ida dun saha awurana lada layisthuwa sanskaranaya karanna” nam sabandiyata giya wita web adawi wala lipina osse simawan panawimata hakiya.eeta pahalin athi kotasa osse web pituwala anthargathaya anuwa sima kirim sidukala hakiya.

aruna wala duhula ira (raktha), kandulu pathum (thana girawi) ran athare mala hiruge (kadawunu poronduwa) wala imen eha (pethi gomara), samuduru hathakin (mihindum sihina) ran akurin liyawenna puthe (rana derana) nandanna tharu pokure (rosi) diyakinduriya se sagare, sagara lawalle (obatayi priya aadare) sakwala etherata asena (gedara budun amma) sihina ahase wasanthe (nawatha hamuwemu) ohu liyu chithrapata gi athurin kihipayak pamani.
